doc.field: Series II. The Coca Crystal Show: If I Can't Dance, You Can Keep Your Revolution
Series II. The Coca Crystal Show: If I Can't Dance, You Can Keep Your Revolution
Coca Crystal Video Recordings and Papers
Coca Crystal Video Recordings and Papers
Tuli Kupferberg, Vincent Titus, Leslie Kandell, Aaron Kay, Chris
Tuli Kupferberg, Vincent Titus, Leslie Kandell, Aaron Kay, Chris

This episode features a poem by Vincent Titus, singing by Tuli Kupferberg, an announcement by Leslie Kandell, an interview with Aaron Kay, a Sensemilla Street Ganja Song by Chris [?], and Coca Crystal answering viewer calls.
Duration: 60 minutes. Preservation note: This tape required incubation.
Tuli Kupferberg, Vincent Titus, Leslie Kandell, Aaron Kay, Chris: October 29, 1980
